sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
    <v-row no-gutters>
      <v-col sm="10" class="mx-auto">
        <v-card class="pa-5">
          <v-card-title>Add New Review</v-card-title>
          <v-divider></v-divider>
          <v-form ref="form" class="pa-5" enctype="multipart/form-data">
            <v-text-field label="Title" prepend-icon="mdi-note" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field label="Category" prepend-icon="mdi-view-list" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-textarea label="Content" prepend-icon="mdi-note" :rules="rules"></v-textarea>
            <v-file-input :rules="rules" show-size counter multiple label="Select Image"></v-file-input>
            <v-btn type="submit" class="mt-3" color="primary">Add Review</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default{
    rules: [(value)=>!!value || "This file is required!!!"]
}
</script>
